name: Dicing Chef Buddy
description:
This food truck convention has gone paws up. As the cat chef Buddy, you're going to need to roll up a lot of ingredients, dice them, and fast!

Features:
- A lot of Hungry Cats, picky-eaters the lot of 'em
- Food Weapons decided by die roll
- Ingredient Shooting Action, each standard food item you dice and upgrade means another awesome weapon against the hungry horde


Credits:
- Made in <48hrs for the GMTK2022 Roll the Dice Game Jam!
- Made Code-iful by Ethan Tobin (HPGames) and Dylan Parker (Supuhdmanz)
- Made Beautiful by Grace Cox (seekee520)
- Made Orchestral by Madison Cobb (Madtastic)
